item.title: Content
item.description: Content services Article writing Includes research and drafting of SEO-oriented articles or press releases to match chosen style guides, along with photography if required. View a sample written for the Motley Fool. The Neighborhood Coffee Shop That Shaped Starbucks' Future A small, unbranded coffee shop served as a secret testing ground for the company and its new premium strategy. There is a sharp contrast between the new Starbucks (NASDAQ:SBUX) Reserve Roastery & Tasting Room and the neighborhood cafe a mile away, Roy Street Coffee & Tea.

item.title: Marketing
item.description: Marketing Content Strategy Includes developing target profiles and subject matter, planning distribution, and analyzing performance with analytics. Crowdfunding Includes campaign and asset creation, promotion, and hand-holding through to the final goal. View sample coverage from Detroit Institute of Bagel's "Save the Bagels" campaign, which raised $10,000. SEO analysis Includes reviewing current keywords and generating targets in order to elevate your search presence and attract more traffic.

item.title: Web Design
item.description: Web design WordPress sites Includes developing custom themes, applying premium themes, integrations, or migrations. View a sample built for the Detroit Institute of Bagels. Custom builds Includes design, coding, domain set up and publishing. View a sample created for a wedding. Ecommerce sites Includes integration with third-party services such as Shopify.

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output. Hugo keeps all static content under static. You should therefore move it all there. With Jekyll, something that looked like ▾ <root>/ ▾ images/ logo.png should become ▾ <root>/ ▾ static/ ▾ images/ logo.png Additionally, you’ll want any files that should reside at the root (such as CNAME) to be moved to static.

item.title: Limited time flat-fee websites
item.description: Viralogy Digital is new. To incentivize some business, we’re offering some low-risk offers to help you become a part of the internet. $100 websites Go templates provide an extremely simple template language. It adheres to the belief that only the most basic of logic belongs in the template or view layer. One consequence of this simplicity is that go templates parse very quickly. A unique characteristic of go templates is they are content aware.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at installing hugo Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has its own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now. Follow the following steps: Clone the hugo repository Go into the repo Run hugo in server mode and build the docs Open your browser to http://localhost:1313 Corresponding pseudo commands:
